thread.title: Wendy's Twitter Account Has Given up Its Chill
thread.title_full: Wendy's Twitter Account Has Given up Its Chill

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Wendy's Twitter Account Has Given up Its Chill
text:
The fast food purveyor of square hamburgers has been sending out some pretty hilarious tweets recently. What started out as an innocent "our beef is way too cool to ever be frozen" marketing tweet has turned into a full on roast. One troll decided to question Wendy’s on its claim, and it didn’t end well for him -- he ended up deleting his account. The hilarity has since picked up steam with many more tweeting at the Wendy’s account with the fast food brand owning them all. A Wendy's representative told Business Insider their account has not been hacked. Check out the video below.

Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
